author: Catherine Campbell
comment: I think I had it on 12 hr at one point but now it's definitely on 24hr again. So am I crazy or is there a way to switch it that I unconsciously discovered? Anyway, I can't do it again if there is. I have emailed about this and gotten no response. Ugh.
title: Only 24 hr?

author: Bri Tracy
comment: Would like better if 12 hour was selectable
title: 12 hour needed!
